thread.title: New Report Published: Kim’s Krypt Haunted Mill
thread.title_full: New Report Published: Kim’s Krypt Haunted Mill

author: prbuzz.com
title: New Report Published: Kim’s Krypt Haunted Mill
text:
Now open TWO locations this September,just in time for the haunting season!
WHAT: Kim’s Krypt Haunted Attractions
WHEN: Friday, September 26th through Halloween
WHERE: Kim’s Krypt Haunted Mill – Spring Grove, PA
 Kim’s Krypt (the Original!) – Essex,MD
BALTIMORE, MD and SPRING GROVE, PA – Now in her 29th year of scaring Baltimore, Kim Yates is taking her show to the next level ( in terrifying PENNSYLVANIA! ) with the expansion, renovation and all-new attractions of KIM’S KRYPT HAUNTED MILL of Spring Grove, PA!
Yates is keeping her Baltimore roots and traditions alive with her classic haunt in Essex, but yet at the same time looking to the future by winning (at auction in 2014!) the fabled Haunted Mill Scream Park of Spring Grove, PA.
Rapidly making improvements to the already terrifying haunted attraction, Yates also has expanded the Scream Park by adding a fifth attraction, all-new for Halloween of 2015 – the HORROR OF MENGES MILL! “We wanted to pay homage to the area we work in by naming it Menges Mill,” said Yates. “And with the haunted third floor of the original Mill open to the public once again, we decided to go over the top – it’s a blackout tour, no lights! ”
We invite your coverage, interest, reviews and interview requests! Please contact us with any questions!
For more information please contact Kevin Perkins at This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. !
And Happy Halloween!
